thread.title: Russell Montlake-Mees
thread.title_full: Rapid Formations reviewed by Russell Montlake-Mees

author: Russell Montlake-Mees
title: Russell Montlake-Mees
text:
I needed to form a Ltd company quickly, and had heard of Rapid Formations - their review seemed pretty good, so decided to have a go....
Definitely not disappointed, filled in the forms online late Friday afternoon, , registered the company name I wanted, and had all the paperwork in my hand Wednesday morning, all done and dusted! Pain free, value for money and just what I needed - what's not to like??
